mapper.select: SELECT cta.CTA_Id, prbi.Project_Title, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Discount, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED)*CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Amount, cta.Trans_MaxTime, cta.Cta_Invest_Rate FROM Creditor_Trans_App cta JOIN Invest_Record ir ON cta.Invest_Id = ir.Invest_Id JOIN Project_App_Record pa ON ir.Apply_Id = pa.Apply_Id JOIN Project_Base_Info prbi ON pa.Project_Base_ID = prbi.Project_Base_ID WHERE cta.Statu in ('0','2') AND ir.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} ORDER BY cta.Cta_Invest_Rate DESC

SELECT cta.CTA_Id, prbi.Project_Title, prbi.Year_Rate, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Discount, (SELECT SUM(IFNULL(ct.Trans_Amount,0)) FROM Creditor_Trans ct WHERE ct.CTA_Id = cta.CTA_Id) Trans_Amount, cta.Deal_Date, ir.Hold_Date, (SELECT SUM(IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Recv_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)+IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Repay_Overdue_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)+IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Repay_Overdue),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)+IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Repay_Penalty),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)-IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Invest_MngFee),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)) FROM Invest_Real_Income iri WHERE iri.Income_Id = (SELECT ii.Income_Id FROM Invest_Income ii WHERE ii.Invest_Id = ir.Invest_Id AND ii.IsValid = 0))*(IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)/IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ir.Invest_Amount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),1))-(IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)-(SELECT SUM(IFNULL(ct.Trans_Amount,0)) FROM Creditor_Trans ct WHERE ct.CTA_Id = cta.CTA_Id))-IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Mng_Fee),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0) Interest_Amount FROM Creditor_Trans_App cta JOIN Invest_Record ir ON cta.Invest_Id = ir.Invest_Id JOIN Project_App_Record pa ON ir.Apply_Id = pa.Apply_Id JOIN Project_Base_Info prbi ON pa.Project_Base_ID = prbi.Project_Base_ID WHERE cta.Statu between 3 and 4 AND ir.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} ORDER BY cta.Deal_Date DESC

SELECT ct.Trans_ID, ir.Invest_Id, prbi.Project_Title, prbi.Year_Rate, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Discount, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ct.Trans_Amount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Amount, ct.Trans_Time FROM Creditor_Trans ct JOIN Creditor_Trans_App cta ON ct.CTA_Id = cta.CTA_Id JOIN Invest_Record ir ON ct.Invest_Id = ir.Invest_Id JOIN Project_App_Record pa ON ir.Apply_Id = pa.Apply_Id JOIN Project_Base_Info prbi ON pa.Project_Base_ID = prbi.Project_Base_ID WHERE ct.Statu between 3 and 4 AND ir.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} ORDER BY cta.Trans_Time DESC

SELECT ii.Invest_Id, lr.Indexs, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ii.SDRecv_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) SDRecv_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ii.SDRecv_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) SDRecv_Interest, ii.SDRecv_MaxTime, iri.Recv_Time, ii.Statu, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Recv_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) + CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Recv_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Recv_Amount, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Repay_Overdue_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) + CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Repay_Overdue),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Overdue_Amount FROM Invest_Income ii JOIN Loan_Repay lr ON ii.Repay_ID = lr.Repay_ID LEFT JOIN Invest_Real_Income iri ON ii.Income_Id = iri.Income_Id WHERE ii.IsValid = 0 AND ii.Invest_Id = #{Invest_Id} and ii.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} ORDER BY lr.Indexs DESC

SELECT cta.CTA_Id, prbi.Project_Title, prbi.Year_Rate, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Discount, (SELECT SUM(IFNULL(ct.Trans_Amount,0)) FROM Creditor_Trans ct WHERE ct.CTA_Id = cta.CTA_Id) Trans_Amount, cta.Apply_Time, cta.Deal_Date, (SELECT SUM(IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Recv_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)+IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Repay_Overdue_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)+IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Repay_Overdue),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)+IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Repay_Penalty),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)-IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(iri.Invest_MngFee),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)) FROM Invest_Real_Income iri WHERE iri.Income_Id = (SELECT ii.Income_Id FROM Invest_Income ii WHERE ii.Invest_Id = ir.Invest_Id AND ii.IsValid = 0))*(IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)/IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ir.Invest_Amount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),1)-(IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)-(SELECT SUM(IFNULL(ct.Trans_Amount,0)) FROM Creditor_Trans ct WHERE ct.CTA_Id = cta.CTA_Id))-IFNULL(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Mng_Fee),#{skey})) AS SIGNED),0)) Interest_Amount FROM Creditor_Trans_App cta JOIN Invest_Record ir ON cta.Invest_Id = ir.Invest_Id JOIN Project_App_Record pa ON ir.Apply_Id = pa.Apply_Id JOIN Project_Base_Info prbi ON pa.Project_Base_ID = prbi.Project_Base_ID WHERE cta.Statu = 4 AND ir.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} ORDER BY cta.Deal_Date DESC

SELECT cta.CTA_Id, prbi.Project_Title, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Discount, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED)*CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cta.Trans_Discount),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) Trans_Amount, cta.Trans_MaxTime, cta.Cta_Invest_Rate FROM Creditor_Trans_App cta JOIN Invest_Record ir ON cta.Invest_Id = ir.Invest_Id JOIN Project_App_Record pa ON ir.Apply_Id = pa.Apply_Id JOIN Project_Base_Info prbi ON pa.Project_Base_ID = prbi.Project_Base_ID WHERE ir.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} ORDER BY cta.Cta_Invest_Rate DESC
